moves.1. e4: Hello to everybody...This is a game that i played with a lower rated player and i actually won no points...I just did it for fun..So feel free to make any comments or rate the game... i started with e4...
moves.2... d6: Then he played d6 instead of other more useful movements..
moves.3... Bd7: Again worthless move instead of developing some pieces..
moves.4. d3: d3 to open th black bishop and to protect the e4 pawn...
moves.4... Be7: He was blocking his queen...An unsafe movement i think....
moves.6. d4: So i challenge d4 in order to opn the game...
moves.7. Nxd4: Now i have two ways, take the pawn with the knight or the queen... I chose the knight in order to open the queen for the f3 square...
moves.7... c5: c5? He's still back in development and he played c5! So I had an easy plan in my mind. The plan is simple...i'd let him took the knight and i'll win the game...Of course he should have prevented that but as i said before he's a low rating player so he might took the chance and risk it...
moves.8. Qf3: I played the queen in order to checkmated him then...
moves.8... cxd4: And as i guessed before he took the knight and ignored the checkmate...
moves.9. Qxf7#: So simple...He forgot to see at his back and at his king's defence...Hope you like it.. Bye and Dag...Haha
